pages.text: A key part of any Entheator's tool kit is a simple Healing spell.$(br)This effect will apply a short $(marked)Regeneration$() effect.

Learning this Spell Effect requires a nearby $(l:miskatonicmysteries:world/altars)$(marked)Altar$() containing a Necronomicon with $(l:miskatonicmysteries:world/occult_knowledge#witch_secret)$(marked)a Witches Secret$().
